en.title: Master's of Science in Computer Science
en.description: Graduated with Highest Honor. Autonomous Systems specialization includes modeling, algorithms, programming, and security. Provides theoretical knowledge in AI (multi-agent systems, data analysis, machine learning), and formal methods, leading to a significant initial research project.

es.title: Certificación en Fundamentos de UX en Línea

fr.title: Certification en Fondamentaux de l'UX en Ligne

zh.title: UX 基础在线认证
zh.description: 参加了一项涵盖基本 UX 概念的在线课程，包括用户研究、可用性测试和信息架构。加强了在创建直观且用户友好的数字体验方面的技能。
